#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

char a[10000], b[10000];
int c[10000], stg[10000], sum[10000], car[10000]; 

int main()
{
	int t, value, t1, t2, r, s, carry;
	int i, la, lb, j, k, prod, x, y, z;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for( i=0; i<t; i++ )
	{
		scanf("%s",a);
		scanf("%s",b);
		la = strlen(a);
		lb = strlen(b);
		value = 0; t1=0; t2=0;
		if( a[0] == '-' )
		{
			t1 = 1;
			la = la-1;
			value = value + 1;
		}
		if( b[0] == '-' )
		{
			t2 = 1;
			lb = lb - 1;
			value = value + 1;
		}
		//int c[la+lb+1];
		y = 0;
		
		//int stg[lb][la+lb];
		for( k=0; k<la+lb; k++ )
		{
			stg[k] = 0;
			sum[k] = 0;
		}
		
		for( j=lb-1; j>=0; j-- )
		{
			x = lb-j-1;
			carry = 0;
			for( k=la-1; k>=0; k-- )
			{
				if(t2)
				r = b[j+1]-48;
				else
				r = b[j]-48;
				if(t1)
				s = a[k+1]-48;
				else
				s = a[k]-48;
				prod = r*s + carry;
				stg[x] = prod%10;
				carry = prod/10;
				x = x + 1;
				if( k == 0 )
				stg[x] = carry;
			}
			for( k=0; k<la+lb; k++ )
			{
				sum[k] = sum[k] + stg[k];
				stg[k] = 0;
			}
		}
		car[0] = 0;
		for( k=0; k<la+lb; k++ )
		{
			sum[k] = sum[k] + car[k];
			c[y] = sum[k]%10;
			car[k+1] = sum[k]/10;
			y = y+1;
		}
		z = 0;
		for( j=y-1;j>=0;j-- )
		{
			if( c[j] != 0 )
			z = 1;
		}
		if( z == 0 )
		printf("0");
		else
		{
			if( value%2 )
			printf("-");
			z = 0;
			for( j=y-1;j>=0;j-- )
			{
				if( c[j] )
				{
					printf("%d",c[j]);
					z = 1;
				}
				else
				{
					if(z)
					{
						printf("%d",c[j]);
					}
				}
			}
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
